summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the alley between blocks 25 and 26, Law's 2nd Addition, being the alley between 3rd Avenue West and 4th Avenue West, from West Garfield Street to West Blaine Street, by paving and otherwise improving the same in accordance with Majority Petition No. 118729 of the City Council of the Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
